Cara Bubarkan Demonstran Jadi Catatan Ombudsman
02 Nov 2019, 07:54 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Pembubaran massa demonstrasi menjadi catatan Ombudsman kepada Kapolri Jenderal Idham Azis yang resmi dilantik Presiden Jokowi. Ombudsman menilai ada pola yang harus diperbaiki.
Anggota Ombudsman RI Adrianus Meliala mengatakan polisi sudah baik dalam perencanaan dan penempatan satuan dalam penanganan demo di Bawaslu Mei lalu dan DPR September lalu. Adrianus juga menilai positif Polwan dan Sabhara tanpa tameng dikedepankan saat aksi damai.
"Kemudian begitu mulai naik yang maju sabhara dengan tameng bening tuh, lalu mulai naik lagi turun dia ganti Brimob yang gede tuh, itu indikasikan peningkatan kemampuan Polri seiring eskalasi unjuk rasa, jadi tidak ada orang tersentuh, bahkan selama ekslakasi terjadi justru Polri yang kena timpuk lah," kata Adrianus.


Komisioner Ombudsman RI (ORI), Adrianus Meliala. (Foto: Ari Saputra)

Namun, kata Adrianus, mulai ada masalah ketika membubarkan massa karena sudah lewat pukul 18.00 WIB. Apalagi, lanjutnya, massa sudah merangsek ke gedung DPR.
"Lalu masuk massa di mana mereka merangsak, gas air mata, peluru karet, mulai bubarkan massa karena tadi sudah lewat jam 6 sore, sudah masuk ke gedung DPR. Nah di situ sudah mulai ada soal, dikaitkan juga dengan konteks mereka menyapu massa, mengusir massa yang masih tinggal di situ mulai ada persoalan," ujarnya.

How to disperse demonstrators into Ombudsman's records
02 Nov 2019, 07:54 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Dissolution of the mass demonstration became the Ombudsman's note to the National Police Chief General Idham Azis who was officially inaugurated by President Jokowi. The Ombudsman assesses that there are patterns that must be corrected.
RI Ombudsman member Adrianus Meliala said the police had been good in planning and placing units in handling demonstrations at the Bawaslu last May and the Parliament last September. Adrianus also positively assessed Polwan and Sabhara without a shield being put forward during the peaceful protest.
"Then as soon as the sabhara advanced went up with a clear shield, then began to go up again he replaced the big Brimob, indicating an increase in Polri's ability as the demonstration escalated, so that no one was touched, even during the execution the Polri was hit instead. lah, "Adrianus said.


RI Ombudsman Commissioner (ORI), Adrianus Meliala. (Photo: Ari Saputra)

However, said Adrianus, there began to be problems when the crowd dispersed because it was past 18.00 WIB. Moreover, he continued, the masses had surged into the capitol.
"Then the mass entered where they surged, tear gas, rubber bullets, began to disperse the masses because it was past 6 pm, had entered the Parliament building. Now there had begun to be a matter, also related to their context sweeping the masses, expelling the masses still living there began to have problems, "he said.
